Chapter.Line: I was so right, and now it is too late to change anything.
After Dr. Fastian and the other researchers retired for the night,
I slipped into the quarantine area using an access card I lifted from a senior scientist.
I know...old habits and whatever, but I needed to make sure. The
beds were empty, and the place was sterile from disuse. No one
had been in here for weeks or months, even. So, where are they?
The records office was left unlocked, and I found exactly what I
hoped didn't exist - test results on the junior researchers.
Brother, you must get someone out here!
